selected_skills.name: count_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To count the total number of objects in the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine the total number of objects present in the image.

selected_skills.name: calculate_remaining_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the number of objects remaining after subtracting specific objects.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to subtract the count of identified objects from the total count to find the remaining objects.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_objects_by_properties
new_skill_specs.purpose: To identify and count objects in an image based on specified color, size, and material properties.
edge_cases: Objects with similar but not exact properties

tests.expect: list of small green metal objects
